title: Man on the moon: Apollo 11 [Edited version]
creator_credit: National Aeronautics and Space Administration and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: Shows the details of the lunar surface from official footage recorded by the Apollo 11 spacecrew during the first manned moon landing on 20th July, 1969. Part of the 2 million feet of film made Public Domain by NASA. Silent film with English subtitles.
creator_credit_for_label: National Aeronautics and Space Administration and Artransa Park Studios
